subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: West Virginia’s Geno Smith made this season’s first bid for the Heisman Trophy, completing 45 of 51 passes for 656 yards and 8 touchdowns.
snippet: West Virginia’s Geno Smith made this season’s first bid for the Heisman Trophy, completing 45 of 51 passes for 656 yards and 8 touchdowns.
